scripts.cy:run: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --browser edge
scripts.cy:run:ci: npm run cy:run --env username=${{ secrets.USERNAME }},password=${{ secrets.PASSWORD }},url=${{ secrets.AZURE_ENDPOINT }},api=${{ secrets.TRAMS_API_ENDPOINT }},apiKey=${{ secrets.TRAMS_API_KEY }}',authKey=${{secrets.CYPRESS_TEST_SECRET}}
scripts.generate:html:report: npm run combine:reports && npm run create:html:report
